name: constellix
description: A Pulumi package for creating and managing Constellix resources.

contacts.description: Contactlists that will be notified when the pool is updated

domains.description: Domains that are using this pool

enabled.description: Whether the pool is enabled or not

failed.description: Whether the pool is considered failed or not

constellix:pools:PoolValuesItemPropertie.description: A possible value for the pool. Depends on the type of pool.

activated.description: Is the value active or not?

enabled.description: Is this value enabled or not?

failed.description: Is this value considered failed by monitoring

policy.description: The failover/check policy for this value

sonarCheckId.description: The ID of the check to use from Sonar

speed.description: The response time in the last check

weight.description: A weight for the value. Must be between 1 and 1000000

contacts.description: Contact lists to be notified if a failover happens in a failover mode.

geoFailover.description: Disable the record if all hosts fail. If all hosts fail, another matching IP Filter, nearest Proximity or World (Default) record will be used instead.

geoproximity.description: The integer ID of a GeoProximity to use for this record. Cannot be used with IP Filter.

ipfilter.description: The integer ID of an IP Filter to use for this record. Cannot be used with GeoPeoximity.

ipfilterDrop.description: If the requesting IP matches the IP filter, don't return a response

notes.description: A description of the record. It must be 512 characters or less.

region.description: Optional region for this record. Will default to 'default'.

skipLookup.description: Only used on POST or PATCH requests for ANAME records, used to specify whether the hostname should be looked up immediately. Will be null otherwise.

ttl.description: How long DNS servers should cache the record for
